changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Request` ( `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `animal` BIGINT NULL, `recipient` BIGINT NULL, `destination_country` BIGINT NULL, `border_crossing_point` BIGINT NULL, `transport` BIGINT NULL, `vehicle_number` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `veterinarian` BIGINT NULL, `transaction_type` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `way_of_storage_during_transportation` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `quarantine_location` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `number_of_days_to_quarantine` INTEGER NULL, `inspector_of_Rosselkhoznadzor` BIGINT NULL, `destination_city` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `postal_code` VARCHAR(50) NULL, `date_of_departure` DATE NOT NULL, `certificate_1_form_number` VARCHAR(50) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
